languages.text: "То есть вы притащили сюда осколок Осколка К'тан? В теле демонического орудия".
"So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? In the body of a Daemon Engine."
languages.original_text: "То есть вы притащили сюда осколок Осколка К'тан? В теле демонического орудия".

traits.locale_text: "So you have brought a shard of the Shard of C'Tan here? In the body of a demonic weapon."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So you have brought a shard of the Shard of C'Tan here? In the body of a demonic weapon."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'Tan Shard's here, haven't you? In the body of a Daemon Engine."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'Tan Shard's here, haven't you? In the body of a Daemon Engine."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? In the body of a Daemon Engine."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? In the body of a Daemon Engine."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Vous avez apporté un fragment de l'Écharde C'tan ici, n'est-ce pas ? Dans le corps d'une machine-démon. »
languages.original_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? In the body of a Daemon Engine."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez apporté un fragment de l'Écharde C'tan ici, n'est-ce pas ? Dans le corps d'une machine-démon. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «De modo que ha traído un fragmento del fragmento de C'tan hasta aquí... en el cuerpo de un ingenio daemónico».
languages.original_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? In the body of a Daemon Engine."

traits.locale_text: «De modo que ha traído un fragmento del fragmento de C'Tan hasta aquí... en el cuerpo de un ingenio daemónico».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “也就是说，你把星神碎片的其中一块碎片放在恶魔引擎里，带了过来？”
languages.original_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? In the body of a Daemon Engine."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，你把星神碎片的其中一块碎片放在恶魔引擎里，带了过来，是吗？”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Ihr habt also ein Stück des C'tan-Fragments hergebracht? In den Körper einer Dämonenmaschine."
languages.original_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? In the body of a Daemon Engine."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt also ein Fragment des C'tan-Fragments hergebracht, ja? In den Körper einer Dämonenmaschine."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「だから、お前はク＝タン・シャードの欠片をここに持ってきたというわけか？魔導兵器の体内に？」
languages.original_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? In the body of a Daemon Engine."

traits.locale_text: 「だから、お前はク＝タン・シャードの欠片をここに持ってきたというわけか？魔導兵器の体内に？」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "C'tan Parçası'nın bir kısmını buraya mı getirdin? İblis Motoru'nun gövdesine yani..."
languages.original_text: "So you have brought a shard of the C'tan Shard here? In the body of a Daemon Engine."
